Reviews.Content: booked double hotel daniela water send hotel location nice clean balcony breakfast ok hotel wifi location close colosseum metro station termini negative reservation written fee taxes included reception invoice fee

Reviews.Title: “Good value - amazing location”

Reviews.Content: booked double bookingcom cheap deal pppn little miffed hear pay tourist tax told included deal possibly fault agent hotel staff friendly encountered breakfast standard european hotels cereal croissants rolls jams ham cheese everyday fresh coffee 2 single beds shoved im beginning realise fairly normal budget hotels bathroom clean impressive finish annoyance staffs habit air conditioning hot fairly powerful little machine little cooled quickly found solution hiding remote spare days oh remote reception neglect tell offer standard little getaway nice location planned siteseeing day day location fantastic walking 30 round corner colosseum walk domus aurea neros garden metro line colosseum couple euros means top hotel recommend budget deals found beat price hostels

Reviews.Title: “No water because of the ice.”
Reviews.Author: Tasos_Serres
Reviews.Content: rome weekend girlfriend friendly couple entered hotel friendly guy welcomed quick drove 2nd floor wich pretty comfortable clean 6th floor friends stayed floor day perfect water tap hotel beacuse cold told receptionist couldnt excuse hole city situation third day didnt water day offered chance hotel nearby discount price days 10euros night unacceptable didnt rights difficult call outside italy lot negotiations manager discount 15euros night black spot accomodation hotel close colosseo 5minutes maximum foot metro easily visit rome

Reviews.Title: “Looking Tired”
Reviews.Author: Stephen F
Reviews.Content: nighter staying impressions entrance garages looked tired clean saying wallpaper peeling joints bathroom door secure lock broken wardrobe doors close hinges properly control unit aircon due low level shutters closed windows ajar local towels etc replacing worn thin clean info guide attractions etc facilities drink provided adequate continental breakfast cheese meats etc bar chance drink service etc honest described bb 3 hotel

Reviews.Title: “Lovely staff, great location, very clean hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Aussietourists_9
Reviews.Content: am surprised read bad reviews hotel love staying 3 nights altogether staff friendly helpful clean bigger ones stayed trip friends bit sufficient ac fine 3 couples happy hotel walk including colosseum location quiet night free wifi safety deposit boxes front desk dont restaurant apart breakfast morning bring own drinks nibblies eat courtyard plenty nice cafes nearby dinner maybe fussy sleepthe rest time weve running rome found hotel extremely comfortable

Reviews.Title: “Great Location to the Historic District”
Reviews.Author: reclusive6099
Reviews.Content: found hotel hotel location price easy navigating major sites adequate breakfast staff overly helpful friendly possibly didnt speak english map getting train station hotel detail difficultly finding hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: acia83 Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: rome weekend afraid hotel arrived positively surprised hotel location excellent 2 minutes walking colosseum termini station metro stop 5min walking distance elegant quiet hotel nice clean stylish helpful staff breakfast various anyway strongly suggest hotel unforgettable staying beautiful city world

Reviews.Title: “Hotel leaves a lot to be desired.”
Reviews.Author: Rachel48658
Reviews.Content: closet suitcase armoire time 4 nights outgoing phone service throughout entire stay service described lackadaisical concierges care lack phone service maybe saving land line outgoing calls people cell phone nowadays calling impossible breakfast minimal stale bread

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location.....”
Reviews.Author: 163avidtraveller
Reviews.Content: visited rome numerous times stayed hotels visit successful booked online wasnt disappointed clean balcony 3 beds requested friendly staff choice italian breakfast lots easy access collosseum 20 mins termini 15 mins piazza maria maggiore quieter location previous visits residential local shops road ideal loacation recommend taxi shuttle fiumicino airport extremely helpful accomodating short notice

Reviews.Title: “Ideally located but room size inadequate for two.”
Reviews.Author: Sainter66
Reviews.Content: hotel conveniently located colosseum termini railway station receptionists speak english assist tours information downside size uncomfortable bed shower screen leaked water bathroom floor breakfast buffet wellstocked didnt air con october warm

Reviews.Content: stayed week left alot desired walls patchy shades paint look dirty premium displayed pictures sheets clean bathroom ancient clean air conditioner mosquitoes eat alive left window day night lucky wasnt hot stayed tv tiny crt screen wifi free lobby weird expensive hotel hand keys reception left staff lost key kept trying blame wait spare breakfast ok buffet people pile food run rolls croissants cold meats jams coffee worst life major issue tables line form patrons waiting table eat 1 waitress meant tables clean dishes serve food time run feet day table massive pile dirty plates add didnt time kitchen location town surrounded ruins shops restaurants near 15 min walk colosseum 10 min walk town restaurants stay fairly run hotel renovation expensive quality location abit

Reviews.Title: “excellent location,comfortable hotel and very good attention”
Reviews.Author: Lana_G82
Reviews.Content: despite negative reviews ive seen share absolutely positive opinion ive stayed hotel july booked paid advance hotel travel agency friend booked internet booking choosen hotel location centre rome tourist attractions close coliseum church santa maria maggiore conveniently located 5 min foot railway subway station termini special train tofrom fiumicino airport hotel staff speaks various spanish attentive helpful breakfast desk bedside table hotel patio plants flowers view patio stay hotel didnt inconvenience cant tell wi fi internet tv channels free parking etc etc rome sightseeing thats stuff price intermediate hotel 3 stars hotel recommended visitors

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: dwpjbp
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel met clean excellent en suite plenty hot water breakfast loacation colleseum 10 min walk metro fairly close eating immediate selection easy stroll hotel choice city break type trip
